metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for corporate gathering

extracted_sections.extracted_text:
Pancakes 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 cup all-purpose flour 
• 
2 tablespoons sugar 
• 
1 teaspoon baking powder 
• 
1/2 teaspoon baking soda 
• 
1/4 teaspoon salt 
• 
1 cup buttermilk 
• 
1 large egg 
• 
2 tablespoons melted butter 
• 
1 teaspoon vanilla extract 
Instructions: 
• 
In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. 
• 
In another bowl, combine buttermilk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract. 
• 
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir unt

• 
1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon 
• 
1 tablespoon butter 
Instructions: 
• 
In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon. 
• 
Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides. 
• 
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and melt the butter. 
• 
Cook the bread slices until golden brown on both sides. 
• 
Serve with syrup and powdered sugar. 
 
 
 
Smoothie Bowl 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 banana 
• 
1/2 cup frozen berries 
• 
1/2 cup Greek yogurt 
• 
1/4 cu

Beef Stroganoff 
Ingredients: 
 
1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced 
 
1 small onion, diced 
 
2 cloves garlic, minced 
 
1 cup mushrooms, sliced 
 
1 cup beef broth 
 
1 cup sour cream 
 
2 tablespoons flour 
 
2 tablespoons butter 
 
1 teaspoon paprika 
 
Salt and pepper to taste 
 
Egg noodles or rice for serving 
Instructions: 
 
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. 
 
Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until translucent. 
 
Add sliced beef and cook until br

 
Place chicken in a baking dish, top with marinara sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese. 
 
Bake for 20-25 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly. 
 
Serve warm. 
 
 
 
Spaghetti Bolognese 
Ingredients: 
 
1 pound ground beef 
 
1 small onion, diced 
 
2 cloves garlic, minced 
 
1 carrot, grated 
 
1 celery stalk, diced 
 
1 can (28 ounces) crushed tomatoes 
 
1/4 cup tomato paste 
 
1/2 cup red wine (optional) 
 
1 teaspoon dried oregano 
 
1 teaspoon dried basil 
 
Salt and p

 
1 teaspoon thyme 
 
1 teaspoon rosemary 
 
1/4 cup olive oil 
 
Salt and pepper to taste 
Instructions: 
 
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
 
In a large baking dish, layer diced eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, onion, and tomatoes. 
 
In a bowl, mix minced garlic, olive oil, thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper. 
 
Pour the mixture over the vegetables and toss to coat. 
 
Bake for 45 minutes until vegetables are tender. 
 
Serve warm. 
 
 
 
Roast Chicken 
Ingredients: 
 
1 whole chicke

 
1/4 cup bacon, chopped 
 
1/4 cup green onions, sliced 
 
Salt and pepper to taste 
Instructions: 
 
In a pot, bring water to a boil and stir in grits. 
 
Reduce heat and simmer until thickened, then stir in shredded cheddar cheese and 
butter. 
 
In a skillet, cook chopped bacon until crispy, then set aside. 
 
In the same skillet, sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened. 
 
Add shrimp and cook until pink and opaque. 
 
Stir in cooked bacon and sliced green onions. 
 
Ser

 
1 cup shredded cheese 
 
1 teaspoon oregano 
 
1 teaspoon basil 
 
2 tablespoons olive oil 
 
Salt and pepper to taste 
 
 
 
Sweet and Sour Pork 
Ingredients: 
 
1 pound pork tenderloin, cubed 
 
1 bell pepper, diced 
 
1 small onion, diced 
 
1/2 cup pineapple chunks 
 
1/4 cup ketchup 
 
1/4 cup rice vinegar 
 
1/4 cup soy sauce 
 
1/4 cup brown sugar 
 
2 tablespoons cornstarch 
 
2 tablespoons vegetable oil 
 
Cooked rice for serving 
Instructions: 
 
In a bowl, toss pork

 
Return chicken to the skillet and cook until heated through. 
 
Serve warm. 
 
 
 
Peking Duck 
Ingredients: 
 
1 whole duck 
 
1/4 cup soy sauce 
 
1/4 cup honey 
 
2 tablespoons hoisin sauce 
 
2 tablespoons rice vinegar 
 
2 cloves garlic, minced 
 
1 teaspoon five-spice powder 
 
1 teaspoon grated ginger 
 
1/4 cup green onions, sliced 
 
Mandarin pancakes for serving 
Instructions: 
 
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
 
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, honey, hoisin sauce, rice vineg

Quiche Lorraine 
Ingredients: 
 
1 pie crust 
 
6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled 
 
1 small onion, diced 
 
1 cup grated Gruyère cheese 
 
3 eggs 
 
1 cup heavy cream 
 
1/2 teaspoon salt 
 
1/4 teaspoon pepper 
Instructions: 
 
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 
 
Place pie crust in a pie dish. 
 
Sprinkle cooked bacon, diced onion, and grated Gruyère cheese over the crust. 
 
In a bowl, whisk eggs, heavy cream, salt, and pepper. 
 
Pour egg mixture over the filling. 
 
Bake for 3

Roast Beef 
Ingredients: 
 
1 beef roast (3-4 pounds) 
 
2 cloves garlic, minced 
 
1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, chopped 
 
1 tablespoon fresh thyme, chopped 
 
1/4 cup olive oil 
 
Salt and pepper to taste 
Instructions: 
 
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). 
 
In a bowl, mix minced garlic, chopped rosemary, chopped thyme, olive oil, salt, and 
pepper. 
 
Rub the mixture over the beef roast. 
 
Place the roast in a roasting pan and cook for 1 hour and 30 minutes until desired 
doneness.

Acarajé 
 
Ingredients:  
o 2 cups black-eyed peas 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o Oil for frying 
 
Instructions: 
o Soak black-eyed peas overnight, then peel and rinse. 
o Blend peas with diced onion, minced garlic, and salt until smooth. 
o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden. 
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm. 
 
Agedashi Tofu 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 block tofu 
o 1/4 cup cornstarch 
o 1 cup dashi broth 
o 2 tablespoons soy sauce 
o 1 table

extracted_sections.section_title: o Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir to coat with spices.
extracted_sections.extracted_text:
o Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir to coat with spices. 
o Cover and cook until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally. 
o Add salt to taste and serve. 
 
Albondigas 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1/2 pound ground beef 
o 1/2 pound ground pork 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs 
o 1 egg 
o 1 teaspoon paprika 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 cup tomato sauce 
 
Instructions: 
o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, bread

Churros 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 cup water 
o 1/2 cup butter 
o 1 cup flour 
o 3 eggs 
o 1/4 cup sugar 
o 1 teaspoon cinnamon 
o Oil for frying 
 
Instructions: 
o Bring water and butter to a boil. 
o Add flour and stir until a dough forms. 
o Remove from heat and beat in eggs one at a time. 
o Heat oil in a pan. 
o Pipe dough into hot oil and fry until golden. 
o Drain on paper towels and roll in a mixture of sugar and cinnamon. 
o Serve warm. 
 
Coconut Rice 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 cup rice 
o 1 c

Cornbread 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 cup cornmeal 
o 1 cup flour 
o 1/4 cup sugar 
o 1 tablespoon baking powder 
o 1/2 teaspoon salt 
o 1 cup milk 
o 1/4 cup vegetable oil 
o 1 egg 
 
Instructions: 
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). 
o Mix cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. 
o Add milk, oil, and beaten egg, stir until combined. 
o Pour batter into a greased baking pan. 
o Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden. 
o Serve warm. 
 
Coxinha 
 
Ingredients: 
o 2 cups shredded chicken

o 2 tablespoons butter 
 
Instructions: 
o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). 
o Spread béchamel sauce on 4 slices of bread. 
o Top with ham and grated cheese, then cover with remaining bread slices. 
o Melt butter in a pan and toast sandwiches until golden. 
o Transfer to a baking sheet, top with more béchamel sauce and cheese. 
o Bake for 10 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly. 
o Serve warm. 
 
Croquetas 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1/2 cup butter 
o 1/2 cup flour 
o 2 cups milk 
o 1/2 cup ham 
o 1

o 2 cloves garlic 
o 4 tomatoes 
o 4 cups vegetable broth 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon coriander 
o 1 teaspoon turmeric 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/4 cup cilantro 
 
Instructions: 
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened. 
o Add diced tomatoes, lentils, chickpeas, vegetable broth, cumin, coriander, 
turmeric, and salt. 
o Simmer for 30 minutes until lentils are tender. 
o Stir in chopped cilantro and serve warm. 
 
Horta 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 pound dandelion greens 
o 1/4 cup oliv

Hummus 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 can chickpeas 
o 1/4 cup tahini 
o 1/4 cup lemon juice 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
 
Instructions: 
o Drain and rinse chickpeas. 
o Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. 
o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. 
o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil. 
 
Japchae 
 
Ingredients: 
o 8 ounces sweet potato noodles 
o 1/2 pound beef 
o 1 small onion 
o 1 carrot 
o 1 bell pepper 
o 1 cu

o 1/4 cup olive oil 
 
Instructions: 
o Toss vegetables with minced garlic, jerk seasoning, and olive oil. 
o Roast at 400°F (200°C) until tender. 
o Serve warm. 
 
Johnny Cakes 
 
Ingredients: 
o 2 cups flour 
o 1/4 cup sugar 
o 1 tablespoon baking powder 
o 1/2 teaspoon salt 
o 1/4 cup butter 
o 1/2 cup milk 
o Oil for frying 
 
Instructions: 
o Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. 
o Cut in cold butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. 
o Add milk and stir until dough

extracted_sections.section_title: o Scramble eggs in the same pan.
extracted_sections.extracted_text:
o Scramble eggs in the same pan. 
o Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, sugar, and lime juice, stir to combine. 
o Add bean sprouts, cooked shrimp, and chopped green onions. 
o Garnish with crushed peanuts and serve. 
 
Pajeon (Pancakes) 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 cup flour 
o 1 cup water 
o 1 egg 
o 1/2 cup green onions 
o 1/2 cup seafood (optional) 
o 1 tablespoon soy sauce 
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil 
 
Instructions: 
o Mix flour, water, and beaten egg in a bowl. 
o Add chopped green onions a

o 1 teaspoon salt 
o Skewers 
 
Instructions: 
o Cut paneer into cubes. 
o Mix yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, and salt in a 
bowl. 
o Add paneer cubes and marinate for at least 1 hour. 
o Thread paneer onto skewers. 
o Grill or broil until golden, turning occasionally. 
o Serve warm. 
 
Panzanella 
 
Ingredients: 
o 4 cups cubed bread 
o 4 tomatoes 
o 1 cucumber 
o 1 small red onion 
o 1/4 cup basil 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar 
o 1 tea

o 1/2 cup tomato sauce 
o 1 teaspoon paprika 
o 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper 
o 1/2 teaspoon salt 
o 1/4 cup mayonnaise 
 
Instructions: 
o Peel and dice potatoes. 
o Toss potatoes with olive oil and salt, then roast at 400°F (200°C) until crispy. 
o Mix tomato sauce, paprika, and cayenne pepper in a bowl. 
o Serve potatoes with tomato sauce and a dollop of mayonnaise. 
 
Pepper Pot 
 
Ingredients: 
o 1 pound beef 
o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 4 cups beef broth 
o 1 cup spinach 
o 1 cu

Chicken Caesar Wrap 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla 
• 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced 
• 
1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped 
• 
2 tablespoons Caesar dressing 
• 
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese 
• 
Optional: croutons for extra crunch 
Instructions: 
• 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly. 
• 
Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese. 
• 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half. 
 
 
 
Quinoa Salad 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 cup cooked quinoa 
• 
1/2

Greek Yogurt Parfait 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 cup Greek yogurt 
• 
1/2 cup granola 
• 
1/2 cup mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries) 
• 
1 tablespoon honey 
Instructions: 
• 
In a bowl or jar, layer the Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries. 
• 
Drizzle with honey. 
• 
Repeat the layers if desired. 
 
 
 
Hummus and Veggie Pita 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 whole wheat pita bread 
• 
1/2 cup hummus 
• 
1/2 cup cucumber, sliced 
• 
1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced 
• 
1/4 cup shredded carrots 
•

o 1/4 cup basil 
o 1/4 cup olive oil 
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar 
o 1 tea

o 1/2 cup tomato sauce 
o 1 teaspoon paprika 
o 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper 
o 1/2 teaspoon salt 
o 1/4 cup mayonnaise 
 
Instructions: 
o Peel and dice potatoes. 
o Toss potatoes with olive oil and salt, then roast at 400°F (200°C) until crispy. 
o Mix tomato sauce, paprika, and cayenne pepper in a bowl. 
o Serve potatoes with tomato sauce and a dollop of mayonnaise.

Chicken Caesar Wrap 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 whole wheat tortilla 
• 
1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced 
• 
1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped 
• 
2 tablespoons Caesar dressing 
• 
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese 
• 
Optional: croutons for extra crunch 
Instructions: 
• 
Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly. 
• 
Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese. 
• 
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.

Greek Yogurt Parfait 
Ingredients: 
• 
1 cup Greek yogurt 
• 
1/2 cup granola 
• 
1/2 cup mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries) 
• 
1 tablespoon honey 
Instructions: 
• 
In a bowl or jar, layer the Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries. 
• 
Drizzle with honey. 
• 
Repeat the layers if desired.
